<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 341 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=513), [Chamidu](/Deities.aspx?ID=612), [Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=284), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Rull](/Deities.aspx?ID=559)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d12.
